G

getAll(int) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.user.UserController
Get all users of the specified role.
It is intended to only be used for tourists or guides, since administrators are not supposed to be known.

getAvailableActions(Tour, Long) - Method in class com.what2see.service.tour.TourService
Returns a TourActionsResponseDTO containing the available actions for the given User onto the specified Tour entity
Its purpose is to provide the client a way to dynamically show or hide UI elements based on actually performable actions.
It should not replace server side checks.
getAvailableActions(Long, Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController
Get the interactions that the requesting user is able to perform on the specified tour.
getById(Long, Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController
Get a specific tour by its ID
getById(Long, Long, Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.user.ConversationController
Get a specific conversation (if already started) by its id or, indirectly, by guide id (only for tourists).
It is intended to only be used by one of the conversation participants (tourist or guide).
getCompletedByMe(Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController
Get the list of tours that have been completed by the requesting tourist
getCompletedTours(Tourist) - Method in class com.what2see.service.tour.TourService
Returns a list of Tour entities that are marked as completed by the given Tourist entity.
Note that excludes tours that are no longer visible to the tourist because they have been made private by the author and the tourist is not among the shared tourists.
getCreatedByMe(Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController
Get the list of tours that have been created by the requesting guide

getReportsById(Long, Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController

getSharedTourists(Long, Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController
Get the list of users that have been shared the specified tour with and therefore are able to see it even if private.
It is intended to only be used by the tour author guide.
getSharedWithMe(Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController
Get the list of tours that have been shared with the requesting user and therefore is able to see even if private.

GuideRepository - Interface in com.what2see.repository.user
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Guide entities.
Only overrides interface method for typing purposes.
Should be injected as UserRepository<Guide> for type safety.
guideService - Variable in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController

guideService - Variable in class com.what2see.mapper.user.ConversationDTOMapper
 
GuideService - Class in com.what2see.service.user
Implementation of the Factory Method design pattern.
Service class that handles the business logic for Guide entities.
Its only use it to provide the concrete instance of the UserRepository interface to the UserService superclass, which contains the generic business logic for all User entities.
Should be injected as UserService<Guide> for type safety.
GuideService() - Constructor for class com.what2see.service.user.GuideService
